sentence.Network_en: Protonema ( pl . protonemata ) The young bryophyte gametophyte that develops following spore germination.
sentence.Network_cn: 苔藓植物中直接由孢子萌发形成的结构称为原丝体.

sentence.Network_en: This paper mainly deals with the present situation, problems and prospect of bryophyte research in Xinjiang.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文介绍了新疆苔藓植物研究的现状 、 存在的问题及对今后研究工作的展望.

sentence.Network_en: Especially, the research of bryophyte ecology and bio diversity are still in blank field.
sentence.Network_cn: 尤其是在新疆苔藓植物生态学和多样性方面的研究仍处于空白状态.
